search_results.title: Lauren Kessler
search_results.snippet: Lauren Kessler is an award-winning narrative nonfiction author who has published 15 books and hundreds of articles, essays, and blogs.

search_results.title: Lauren Grodstein
search_results.snippet: Lauren Grodstein is an American novelist and professor at Rutgers University-Camden who is known for her use of male characters and family narratives.
